div.p: Evolutionary analyses of the C. himalaica genome. ( A) Age distribution of 4DTv distance values between orthologs of C. himalaica and A. thaliana, C. himalaica and A. lyrata, and C. himalaica and C. rubella. ( B) Insertion time distribution of LTR retrotransposons. ( C) Estimation of divergence times of nine species in the Brassicaceae. ( D) Venn diagram showing unique and shared gene families between genomes of C. himalaica and four close relatives.
